caption.p: Productivity of 11 different phenolic compounds quantified via HPLC, in callus cultures of Fagonia indica after elicitation with UV-C radiations (0–10.8 kJ/m 2) and maintained in different light regimes; cont. light (24 h), dark (24 h) and photoperiod (PHP, 16L/8D h). Values represented as mean ± SE of three replicates. Different (black for UV + PHP, red for UV + cont light, green for UV + dark) letters represent significant differences between the various experimental conditions ( p < 0.05).
